=% \approx
 [\Phi,{\cal W}_\alpha]
=% \approx
 {\cal W}_\alpha Q

\begin{align}
 S
 =\oint_{C} \frac{dz}{2\pi i} R(z),\qquad
 w_\alpha
 =\oint_{C} \frac{dz}{2\pi i} w_\alpha(z),\qquad
 N
 =\oint_{C} \frac{dz}{2\pi i} T(z),
 \label{eq:requirement_for_gt_resolvents}
\

\begin{align}
 {\bf F}({\bf S})
 =\sum_{{\cal M}} {\bf g}^{2-\chi({\cal M})} {\cal F}_{{\cal M}}({\bf S})
 ={\cal F}_{S^2}+{\bf g}{\cal F}_{RP^2}+{\bf g}{\cal F}_{D^2}+\cdots,
\

\begin{align}
 {\bf R}(z)=\sum_{{\cal M}} {\bf g}^{2-\chi({\cal M})} {\bf R}_{\cal M}(z),
 \qquad
% \mR_\CM(z),

 %
 {\bf M}(z)=\sum_{{\cal M}} {\bf g}^{2-\chi({\cal M})} {\bf M}_{\cal M}(z).

\begin{align}
 \lambda
 =&
 \left(-1+\frac{2}{N}\right)\frac{S}{m}g
 +\left(-{3\over N}+{12\over N^2}\right)\frac{S^2}{m^4}g^3
 +\left(-{1\over N}-{24\over N^2}+{160\over N^3}\right)\frac{S^3}{m^7}g^5
 \nonumber\\
 &+
 \left(-{3\over 4 N}-{27\over N^2}-{192\over N^3}+{2688\over N^4}
  \right)\frac{S^4}{m^{10}}g^7
 +{\cal O}(g^9)
 \equiv {\tilde{\lambda}}.
\

\begin{align}
 {\tilde{W}}_{\rm eff}
 =&
 W_{\rm eff}|_{\lambda={\tilde{\lambda}}}
 =
 \left.\left[
   N\frac{\partial}{\partial S}{\cal F}_{S^2} + 4{\cal F}_{RP^2}
 \right]\right|_{\lambda={\tilde{\lambda}}}
 \nonumber\\
 =&
 \left(-1+\frac{4}{N}\right)S^2\alpha
 +\left(-\frac{1}{3}-\frac{8}{N}+\frac{160}{3N^2}\right)S^3\alpha^2
 +\left(-\frac{1}{3}-\frac{12}{N}-\frac{256}{3N^2}+\frac{3584}{3N^3}\right)S^4\alpha^3
 \nonumber\\
 &+\left(-\frac{1}{2}-\frac{24}{N}-\frac{352}{N^2}+\frac{33792}{N^4}\right)S^5\alpha^4
  +\cdots,
\
